synopsis.text: Karasuma Chitose, a college student with a penchant for the unconventional, refuses to succumb to the mundane life of adulthood. She sets her sights on the world of voice acting, managing to secure a position at "Number One Produce," a voice acting agency run by her older brother, Gojou. With dreams of stardom in her eyes, Chitose's reality check comes in the form of minor roles and clashes with fellow agency members, including a crafty scatterbrain and a girl with a distinctive Kansai dialect. As she navigates the cutthroat industry, Chitose learns that success demands more than she initially thought, forcing her to reevaluate her pride and ambition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
